name: Flora Facial Tissues 2Ply
description: Hygienic, Soft and Absorbent Flora Facial Tissue is certified as SLS 1340  by the SriLanka Standards Institution. Flora Facial Tissues is available in four different sizes,  namely 50’s, 100’s, 160’s and 200’s sheets per box. Flora Facial Tissue is essential for you for facial makeup, to clean your face on a hot day or for hygienic purpose, when you have a runny nose. It is dust-free and safely cleans your face. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
